name_basics.table_description: Table containing basic information about people in IMDb';

knownfortitles.description: titles the person is known for (array of tconsts)
knownfortitles.name: knownfortitles

nconst.description: alphanumeric unique identifier of the name/person (string)
nconst.name: nconst

primaryname.description: name by which the person is most often credited (string)
primaryname.name: primaryname

primaryprofession.description: the top-3 professions of the person (array of strings)
primaryprofession.name: primaryprofession

title_akas.table_description: Table containing alternate titles for IMDb entries';

attributes.description: Additional terms to describe this alternative title (array), not enumerated
attributes.name: attributes

ordering.description: a number to uniquely identify rows for a given titleId (integer)
ordering.name: ordering

region.description: the region for this version of the title (string)
region.name: region

titleid.description: a tconst (string, an alphanumeric unique identifier of the title)
titleid.name: titleid

types.description: Enumerated set of attributes for this alternative title (array). One or more of the following: "alternative", "dvd", "festival", "tv", "video", "working", "original", "imdbDisplay". New values may be added in the future without warning
types.name: types

title_basics.table_description: Table containing basic information about IMDb titles';

endyear.description: TV Series end year (YYYY). ‘\N’ for all other title types
endyear.name: endyear

genres.description: includes up to three genres associated with the title (string array)
genres.name: genres

primarytitle.description: the more popular title (string) (the title used by the filmmakers on promotional materials at the point of release)
primarytitle.name: primarytitle

runtimeminutes.description: primary runtime of the title (integer, in minutes)
runtimeminutes.name: runtimeminutes

startyear.description: represents the release year of a title (YYYY). In the case of TV Series, it is the series start year
startyear.name: startyear

tconst.description: alphanumeric unique identifier of the title (string)
tconst.name: tconst

titletype.description: the type/format of the title (string) (e.g. movie, short, tvseries, tvepisode, video, etc)
titletype.name: titletype

title_crew.table_description: Table containing crew information for IMDb titles';

directors.description: director(s) of the given title (array of nconsts)
directors.name: directors

tconst.description: alphanumeric unique identifier of the title (string)
tconst.name: tconst

writers.description: writer(s) of the given title (array of nconsts)
writers.name: writers

title_episode.table_description: Table containing episode information for TV series in IMDb';

episodenumber.description: episode number of the tconst in the TV series (integer)
episodenumber.name: episodenumber

parenttconst.description: alphanumeric identifier of the parent TV Series (string)
parenttconst.name: parenttconst

seasonnumber.description: season number the episode belongs to (integer)
seasonnumber.name: seasonnumber

title_principals.table_description: Table containing principal cast and crew information for IMDb titles';

category.description: the category of job that person was in (string)
category.name: category

characters.description: the name of the character played if applicable, else
characters.name: characters

job.description: the specific job title if applicable, else
job.name: job

nconst.description: alphanumeric unique identifier of the name/person (string)
nconst.name: nconst

ordering.description: a number to uniquely identify rows for a given titleId (integer)
ordering.name: ordering

tconst.description: alphanumeric unique identifier of the title (string)
tconst.name: tconst

title_ratings.table_description: Table containing user ratings for IMDb titles';

averagerating.description: weighted average of all the individual user ratings (float)
averagerating.name: averagerating

numvotes.description: number of votes the title has received (integer)
numvotes.name: numvotes

tconst.description: alphanumeric unique identifier of the title (string)
tconst.name: tconst
